excerpt: The Chi, Duster, Murderbot and oh so many finales! Find out what's new, returning and leaving the small screen in the next seven days.

To help you anticipate and navigate all that television has to offer across broadcast, cable and streaming, TVLine offers daily, weekly and monthly What to Watch digests, as well as an overview of every new TV show premiering in 2025.

This week, youâ€™ll find 10 new shows (including Duster, Murderbot and Overcompensating) and a whopping 27 finales â€” including season enders for 9-1-1, Greyâ€™s Anatomy, The Rookie, Tracker and Will Trent, and the very last episodes of Andor, Found and S.W.A.T.

Want scoop on any of the following shows? Email usÂ and your question may be answered in Mattâ€™s Inside Line.
